Name: Counter Calendar
Description: Track your data changes in time!
Long Summary: Track your data changes in time!
Description Full:
Our Counter Calendar is a powerful tool designed for anyone looking to track and analyze financial, numerical, and quantitative data in a clear and efficient manner. With an innovative approach to data presentation, our product enables quick understanding of trends, identification of key data points, and informed decision-making for businesses of all sizes.

Advantages of the Product

  • Intuitive Interface: The Counter Calendar offers a simple and intuitive interface, allowing users to navigate and analyze data effortlessly, even without advanced technical knowledge.

  • Clear Data Presentation: By utilizing a calendar-like design, users can quickly and easily track their data based on specific dates, weeks, and months, facilitating better understanding of trends and patterns in data series.

  • Week and Month Summation: The feature to sum weeks and months allows users to quickly obtain data summaries at various levels, enhancing overall comprehension and identifying key areas for analysis.

Name: ProgBar
Description: ProgBar: visual representation of percentage share
Long Summary: ProgBar: visual representation of percentage share
Description Full:
Bored with old-school pie charts and gauges? Time to new, modern approach to display percentages on your dashboards!

Why ProgBar?

Traditional data representation methods often fall short in capturing attention and conveying information effectively. With ProgBar, we've reimagined how you can present percentage shares, making data interpretation not only accurate but also visually appealing.

Key Features

  • Customizable Imagery: ProgBar allows you to use images which represent groups of your data, making it incredibly versatile for various contexts. Whether it's showcasing the percentage of female customers with feminine symbols or the percentage of sales with dollar signs, the choice is yours.

  • Dynamic Color Filling: Watch as your chosen images dynamically fill with color, representing the percentage share with precision and clarity. This intuitive visual cue enhances understanding at a glance, saving time and ensuring your message resonates.

  • Seamless Integration: Designed specifically for Power BI, ProgBar seamlessly integrates into your existing workflows. Effortlessly incorporate ProgBar into your reports and dashboards to enhance the visual impact of your data presentations.

  • Simple use: just add your measure, choose the icon and your colors.

Unlock the Potential of Your Data

Gone are the days of static, uninspiring data visuals. With ProgBar, transform your presentations into engaging narratives that captivate audiences and drive action. Whether you're analyzing customer groups, tracking sales performance, or monitoring project milestones, ProgBar empowers you to tell your data story with flair.

Get Started Today

Ready to revolutionize the way you visualize percentage shares? Try ProgBar now and experience the difference firsthand. Elevate your data presentations with ProgBar and unleash the full potential of your insights.

Name: BasicMap
Description: 中国地图组合组件,包括中国色块地图、热力地图、散点地图、流向地图
Long Summary: 中国地图组合组件,包括中国色块地图、热力地图、散点地图、流向地图
Description Full:
该组件为中国地图，用户可以自定切换中国色块地图、热力地图、散点地图、流向地图。地图主要服务于制造业、金融相关的客户。该地图可以应用于公司业务的区域分布、产品分布、市场的流向、市场辐射情况等。
色块地图：可以通过对各省或行政区数值范围设置不同阶梯度颜色，颜色变化则反应数据值的不同。从而可以直观的通过地图中各省份或行政区区域内颜色变化来直观的反应各区域数据大小变化。可适用金融、销售等行业汇总数据概览。
热力地图：同样通过设置不同阶梯颜色来反应数据变化，但热力数据可以更细化为更多地理位置，通过不同位置经纬度打点来绘制一片颜色深浅不一的区域图，颜色表示密集度越大或数值高。从而提现一种分布密集度的趋势效果图。
散点地图：是在热力地图基础上把各地理位置上的点具象化，并在每个点上通过颜色不同反应对于值所属范围大小。也可以通过设置散点根据数据值大小变化来直观反应各点位的数据不同。适用行业内数据汇总对比。
流向地图：不仅包含了散点地图中散点的特性，更多了数据流向的特性。可适用人口、人才、资源流向转移，也适用差旅途径路径。

Name: swOrgChart
Description: 该可视化可以应用于公司组织结构、家族族谱等业务场景。
Long Summary: 该可视化可以应用于公司组织结构、家族族谱等业务场景。
Description Full: 以树状可视化的方式，通过不同的层级关系对数据的归属进行自动布局，组件必须包含子节点id（id）和父节点id（parentid），且id和parentid之间存在父子层级关系，通过父子层级关系对组件不同节点的归属进行布局分类。

3.此地图可直观反映数据分布,包括省份信息、地级信息、以及县级信息

Long Summary: 桑基图即桑基能量分流图，也叫桑基能量平衡图。它是一种特定类型的流程图，图中延伸的分支的宽度对应数据流量的大小。

Name: Bridger Visual by BI Samurai
Description: This visual makes working with BI Samurai's Bridger Solution a piece of cake
Long Summary: This visual makes working with BI Samurai's Bridger Solution a piece of cake
Description Full:
BI Samurai's Bridger solution allows you to make phone calls and send emails directly from Power BI.

The Bridger Visual is here to help users make the most of the Bridger solution.

Visit https://bisamurai.com/bridger/ to learn how to place a call or send an email from Power BI.

As you can see on the website above, using the Bridger requires the user to construct URLs in a specific format. With the Bridger Visual, a user receives a visual that will make this much easier. Simply drop columns or measures into the relevant buckets/placeholders of the visual and you'll automatically get the correct URL. 

We are committed to bringing more functionality to the Bridger. If you are trying to open links to an on-premise system from Power BI but are blocked, reach out to support@bisamurai.com and we'll see if we can enhance the Bridger with the needed logic.

Name: Change Chart
Description: Change Chart - capturing data transitions with clarity through intuitive arrow-based visuals.
Long Summary: Change Chart - capturing data transitions with clarity through intuitive arrow-based visuals.
Description Full: The Change Chart takes data comparison to the next level, showcasing fluctuations with intuitive horizontal arrows for each category. Instead of juggling multiple bars or overlapping elements, the Change Chart employs arrow lengths and directions to depict growth, decline, or steadiness. This distinct design makes changes immediately evident, ensuring that viewers can grasp the essence of the data at a glance. The Change Chart stands out in business analytics and financial reporting. It is ideal for those who need to illustrate variations or progress. If clarity and immediate comprehension are your goals, the Change Chart provides an elegant solution to represent your data's evolving story.

Name: PictoBar
Description: Transform your numbers in to icons!
Long Summary: Transform your numbers in to icons!
Description Full:
PictoBar: Pictogram Visualization for Microsoft Power BI.

Introducing an innovative way of presenting data, IT-Dev present Pictobar - a revolutionary visualization that transforms ordinary numbers into dynamic pictograms. Designed for the Microsoft Power BI platform, PictoBar brings a new dimension to data interpretation, enabling quick and intuitive analysis.

Key Features

  • Pictogram Display of Numbers: PictoBar converts standard numbers into icons, where each icon represents specific values. This makes data analysis incredibly intuitive and accessible to users at every level of expertise.

  • Effective Visual Communication: With the unique form of pictograms, PictoBar enables users to quickly convey information and achieve effective visual communication, which is crucial in the decision-making process.

  • Intuitive Visualization: Instead of wasting time interpreting complicated charts or tables, PictoBar allows users to quickly understand the range of values and their proportions using clear icons.

  • Customization and Configuration: PictoBar offers flexibility in customizing the appearance and behavior of pictograms, allowing users to optimize data presentation for their specific analysis. User can choose from built-in icons or use standard Microsoft Windows smileys.

  • Business Analytics: PictoBar facilitates tracking of business indicators and trends, allowing for quick identification of key areas and understanding data.

  • Results Monitoring: With clear pictograms, results monitoring becomes simpler and more efficient, enabling quick identification of exceptions and areas for optimization.

Pictobar is not just a tool, it's a revolution in the way data is presented and analyzed in Microsoft Power BI. Experience a new dimension of number interpretation and make your analyses more exciting than ever with PictoBar!

Contact us

Don't hesitate to reach out! Whether you have questions, feedback, or just want to chat, feel free to contact us anytime at kontakt@it-dev.eu.

Name: SharewinfoPowerSlicer
Description: 通过该组件可实现Power BI可视化的多种复杂数据筛选。
Long Summary: 通过该组件可实现Power BI可视化的多种复杂数据筛选。
Description Full: 通过该组件可实现Power BI可视化的多种复杂数据筛选，刷新Power BI复杂数据筛选的新高度。同时动态默认值的生成，可从数据库中自动获取默认值的设置。例如：不同用户进入同一报表，可以直接切片显示该用户数据为默认数据。Slicer高级切片器可适用于多个行业，例如金融、教育、医疗、汽车等行业。

Name: Traqplan Timeline Pro
Description: Creates a plan on a page or gantt timeline for multiple projects with edge-wrap and change tracking.
Long Summary: Creates a plan on a page or gantt timeline for multiple projects with edge-wrap and change tracking.
Description Full:
Visualize your projects and portfolio plans with the Traqplan Timeline:

Traqplan timeline was designed by project professionals for project professional and used actively across the industries such as construction, government and defence sectors to visualize complex programmes in a simple manner. It excels at producing clean views in multiple themes such as plan-on-a-page, or gantt while providing users the ability to easily change their scaling and view layouts with a dynamic settings dialog to allow individual users to tailor the view to suit their needs without changing the default published version.

View all your projects/programs/portfolios with data from one or multiple sources.

Get online help or downline the sample .pbix file from appsource for guidance.

Features

  • View one project or your entire portfolio at a glance
  • Extremely clean interface which takes care of edge-of-page wrapping for clean presentation every time
  • Track changes: monitor progress against a baseline or changes since previous reporting period with red slippage lines and green recovery lines.
  • Identify completed tasks. Completed tasks can be displayed as greyed out
  • Users can tailor their own views and scaling using scroll bars and the dynamic settings dialog
  • Multiple layouts
    • Create a plan on a page view to see more on the page
    • Gantt view for the traditional layout commonly used when viewing a single project
    • Milestones only view to get rid of clutter
    • Milestones as phases to show them as bars rather than diamonds
  • Configure swimlane groups: drag and drop any fields to create a hierarchy of swimlanes
  • Advanced swimlanes using outline numbers: When importing data from planning tools such as Microsoft Project or equivalent then bring across the outline number to mirror the project structure
  • Show Milestones as Phases layout is often useful to show a lot of projects which have common stages/phases in a very condensed view one above the other
  • Add a vertical line at any date, colour and style desired
  • Zoom and scale use automatic font sizing or manually set the font sizing
  • Text layout: text is shown inside bars where possible but you can or select always outside bars to create that traditional gantt view
  • Toggle scrollbars on or off: allows for both clean publishing and user interaction

    • The Traqplan Timeline can display data from Primavera, P6, Asta, Microsoft Project Online, Microsoft Project for the web, Microsoft Project for Operations, Microsoft DevOps, Jira, Smartsheet and more.

Visit https://powerbi.traqplan.com for more information and to purchase a subscription for the unlimited version.

Name: Balanced Scorecard
Description: Transform your organization's performance tracking and decision-making with a Balanced Scorecard
Long Summary: Transform your organization's performance tracking and decision-making with a Balanced Scorecard
Description Full:
Unlock the full potential of your organisation's performance tracking and strategic decision-making with our powerful Balanced Scorecard Visualization in Power BI. Our solution empowers you to create, manage, and analyse a comprehensive set of key performance indicators (KPIs) across various aspects of your business, all in one centralized dashboard.

A Balanced Scorecard is a strategic management tool that provides a holistic view of an organisation's performance. It goes beyond traditional financial metrics to include key indicators from four critical perspectives: financial, customer, internal processes, and learning and growth. This approach ensures that your business strategy is well-rounded and aligned with your long-term goals.

We believe that effective performance management begins with accurate data visualisation and analysis. Our Balanced Scorecard Visualization in Power BI provides you with the tools and insights you need to drive success, align your strategy, and make informed decisions.

Start transforming your organisation's performance tracking today.

Below are some of the visuals features.

Dashboard View
Customisable dashboard which includes features such as owner, target, trend, sparkline, notes, year to date etc.

Detail View
Detail view showing the data over time for each measure along with overlaid targets.

Actions
Create actions for each metric with an owner, due date and progress.


Customisable
Customise the colour scheme, font, fields that are shown, chart axis etc.

Predictions
Enable predictions to plot predicted future values for each metric.

Name: Donut Chart image
Description: Advanced Donut Chart Visualization
Long Summary: Advanced Donut Chart Visualization
Description Full:

Versatile Applications: Ideal for various business use cases, our Donut Chart is a valuable asset for marketing analysis, sales evaluations, and trend assessments. It's a must-have tool for anyone seeking in-depth data understanding.

Name: PBI AI Agent
Description: AI-powered data analysis assistant using AI to help analyze and understand your Power BI data
Long Summary: AI-powered data analysis assistant using AI to help analyze and understand your Power BI data
Description Full:
PBI AI Agent: Intelligent Data Analysis for Power BI

Transform your Power BI reports into interactive AI-powered data analysis experiences. Ask natural language questions about your data and receive instant insights, trends, and visualizations powered by leading AI models including Claude 4 Sonnet, GPT-4.1, and Gemini 2.5 Pro and others.

Description of the Offer

PBI AI Agent is a custom Power BI visual that integrates advanced AI capabilities directly into your dashboards and reports. Users can interact with their data through natural language conversations, generate instant charts, and receive comprehensive analytical insights without technical expertise. The visual supports multiple AI models, features persistent chat history, interactive chart generation, and professional theming that integrates seamlessly with Power BI environments.

Type of User That Benefits

Both technical and non-technical users who want to quickly get insights, detect anomalies, and understand data patterns without spending time on manual analysis. Perfect for anyone who needs instant answers from their data regardless of their technical skill level.

Customer Need or Pain Addressed

When users see something unusual in their dashboard or want to understand the "why" behind their data, they typically need to dive into underlying data analysis that requires technical skills and deep domain knowledge. The data structure itself may not be straightforward, making manual analysis time-consuming and complex.

PBI AI Agent outsources this technical analysis by letting users simply ask questions like "Why did sales drop in Q3?" or "What's causing this spike in costs?" and receive instant, comprehensive explanations. While users should always verify results, the AI handles the heavy lifting of data exploration and pattern recognition.

Key Capabilities Include:

  • Natural language queries for instant data insights
  • Interactive chart generation
  • Smart data context processing across entire datasets
  • Professional chat interface with persistent history
  • Enterprise-ready security with user-configurable API keys
  • Multiple AI model support for optimal analysis
  • Comprehensive support documentation
  • Compatible with all Power BI environments: Power BI Online, Desktop and Report Server
  • Rich formatting options to match your company branding or theme
  • Smart Tokenization with Real-time Monitoring - Displays token usage and context utilization for each query, allowing users to optimize their data inputs and select the best AI model for maximum analysis quality

Perfect for organizations wanting to transform static dashboards into dynamic, conversational data experiences that drive better decision-making across all user skill levels.

For video walkthrough and more info visit pbi-ai-agent.com
Keywords: AI data analysis,Power BI AI,Power BI AI Chatbot,PBI AI Agent

Name: SIGHTIT
Description: Instantly create charts, find trends, and get insights just by asking questions in plain language
Long Summary: Instantly create charts, find trends, and get insights just by asking questions in plain language
Description Full:
SIGHTIT is your personal AI data analyst, embedded directly in Power BI. It replies in plain language, generates bar, line, pie, doughnut, polar area, radar, scatter, bubble charts or tables upon your request. Drag in your data, ask a question in plain language, and get an instant analysis and visualization.

Who is it for?

  • Sales and Marketing teams looking for quick insights into performance.
  • Managers and Decision-Makers who want direct answers from their data.
  • Analysts who need to accelerate their workflow.

Key Features

  • Natural Language Queries: Translate plain questions like "compare sales by region" directly into data insights and visualizations.
  • Instant Visualization: Automatically generate the appropriate chart for your query.
  • On-Demand Data Analysis: Instantly calculate trends, correlations, comparisons, and outliers without manual setup.
  • Conversational Interface: Ask follow-up questions to drill down and explore your data further in a continuous conversation.

Example Questions You Can Ask

  • "Show me total sales by month as a line chart"
  • "Compare revenue year over year"
  • "What is the correlation between marketing spend and new users?"
  • "Which 5 products have the highest profit margin?"

Advanced Analysis (Beta)

For complex statistical analysis or non-standard queries that go beyond typical aggregations, covariance and correlation, SIGHTIT may use its advanced computational engine. This functionality allows for even more flexible analysis but is considered a beta feature with potentially variable performance.

How It Works

  • Connect Your Data: Drag the fields you want to analyze into the visual.
  • Ask a Question: Use the prompt bar to ask for the analysis you need.
  • Get Instant Results: SIGHTIT queries the AI and returns a ready-to-use chart and text summary.

Licensing Information

Please note: A paid SIGHTIT license key is required to use the features of this visual.

How to Get Started

  • Purchase a License: Visit our official website to choose a plan and purchase your license key.
  • Receive Your Key: Your unique license key will be displayed on the confirmation page and sent to your email immediately after purchase.
  • Activate the Visual: Open your Power BI report, add the SIGHTIT visual, paste your license key into the setup field, and click 'Validate' to activate all features.

Acterys Copy is a custom Power BI visual for planning that enhances your Power BI scenario planning and forecasting processes. It allows users to copy data between scenarios in Power BI, streamlining workflows by reusing historical or actuals-based data to build future plans. Whether working at the model level or focusing on specific dimensions like cost centers or products, this data copy Power BI visual ensures agility and consistency across your planning efforts.

With full integration into Acterys' advanced features, including Power BI write-back visuals and comprehensive planning tools, Acterys Copy empowers organizations to build accurate forecasts and maintain centralized scenario control—all from within Power BI.

Acterys delivers robust solutions that simplify planning and forecasting in Power BI, making financial and operational decision-making faster, easier, and more reliable.

Key Features:

  • Persistent Scenario Management: Centrally store and manage all scenarios in SQL Server for consistent and reliable data access across planning cycles.
  • Flexible Data Copying: Effortlessly copy data between scenarios in Power BI, using past actuals to quickly build new plans.
  • Dimension-Specific Copying: Target key areas like cost centers, departments, or products for more focused and precise scenario planning.
  • Comprehensive Planning Integration: Supports top-down, bottom-up, and driver-based planning methods within copied datasets.
  • Versatile Access: Manage and interact with your scenarios through Power BI, Excel, or any SQL Server client.

Key Benefits:

  • Accelerate Planning Workflows: Jump-start planning processes with fast and flexible data copy in Power BI.
  • Improve Data Consistency: Maintain a single source of truth with centralized scenario management in Power BI.
  • Enable Agile Decision-Making: Update or adjust forecasts quickly in response to changing market dynamics.
  • Enhance Forecast Accuracy: Ground your projections in historical data to support more informed planning.
  • Simplify Scenario Management: Access and manage all planning scenarios directly within Power BI for a smoother user experience.

Why Choose Acterys Power BI Visuals?

  • Trusted by 1000+ customers across SMBs, enterprises, government, and Fortune 500 companies
  • 1M+ global downloads and counting
  • 9 custom Power BI visuals and 20+ apps on AppSource covering a wide range of FP&A and xP&A use cases
  • Seamless integration with popular platforms like QuickBooks, Xero, Oracle NetSuite, Microsoft Dynamics 365, and more

Download Acterys Copy Visual today to simplify scenario management in Power BI and take your planning and forecasting in Power BI to the next level.

Name: Acterys Reporting for FP&A
Description: Professional financial reports with custom calculations, comments & visualizations according to IBCS
Long Summary: Professional financial reports with custom calculations, comments & visualizations according to IBCS
Description Full:
Acterys Reporting is a powerful Power BI financial reporting visual that transforms how finance teams present, analyze, and collaborate on data. With support for IBCS-compliant reporting in Power BI, this visual allows you to build professional, consistent reports—without writing complex DAX formulas.

From variance analysis in Power BI to rich text commenting and write-back support, Acterys Reporting provides full flexibility for analysts and CFOs who need more from their visuals. With built-in financial statement formatting features and centralized styling options, reports look consistent, clean, and ready for boardrooms.

Ideal for FP&A, strategy, and operations teams, this custom Power BI visual for finance integrates seamlessly with Acterys' planning capabilities for an all-in-one reporting and decision-making solution.

Key Features:

  • Custom Row and Column Calculations: Add Gross Margin, EBIT, and other metrics using spreadsheet-style logic directly in Power BI.
  • IBCS-Compliant Variance Visualization: Display variances in absolute/relative terms using customizable waterfall charts and comparison columns.
  • Rich Text Commenting: Add row- or cell-level narratives to highlight assumptions or insights, ideal for collaboration and audit trails.
  • Professional Financial Formatting: Apply underlines, parentheses, percent signs, and scaling to ensure financial formatting in Power BI is precise and presentation-ready.
  • Centralized Styling Table: Ensure report-wide consistency using centralized styling in Power BI—colors, sizes, and formatting update in real time.
  • Planning & Write-Back Integration: Adjust values and planning assumptions directly in the report using write-back features in Power BI.

Key Benefits:

  • Rapid Report Creation: Build financial reports quickly, without needing deep DAX expertise.
  • Standardized Visuals: Adhere to IBCS standards for clear, comparable reporting across teams.
  • High Customization: Tailor reports with flexible calculations and visual logic.
  • Cohesive Presentation: Maintain brand consistency with centralized visual settings.
  • Collaborative Insights: Use row-level commenting in Power BI to explain numbers and foster alignment.

Why Choose Acterys Power BI Visuals?

  • Trusted by over 1,000 customers including SMBs, government agencies, and Fortune 500 companies
  • 1M+ global downloads with 4.5+ average ratings
  • 9 custom visuals and 20+ integrated apps across Microsoft AppSource
  • Supports QuickBooks, Xero, Oracle NetSuite, Microsoft Dynamics 365, and more

To learn more, visit Acterys | Plan to Succeed

Simplify financial reporting in Power BI with Acterys Reporting—built for finance professionals who demand clarity and control.
Book your demo today and start creating insightful, IBCS-aligned reports with ease.

Name: PlanIn BI Versioning
Description: Visual with write-back capability enables Power BI users to edit data within the Power BI report.
Long Summary: Visual with write-back capability enables Power BI users to edit data within the Power BI report.
Description Full:
PlanIn BI Versioning is a powerful Power BI custom visual designed to streamline the creation and management of planning and forecasting versions directly within Power BI. This table visual empowers users to initialize new plans or duplicate existing ones, providing flexibility and control in managing planning cycles and forecasting scenarios.
With PlanIn BI Versioning, users can easily create plans for future periods, such as the upcoming year or beyond. During initialization, users can select the base data for the new plan, choosing from options like actual data from the previous year, existing plans, or a mixed approach where some months are based on actuals while others rely on forecasts or prior plans. This enables organizations to tailor their planning processes to their specific needs, ensuring accuracy and relevance. Users can also duplicate existing plans to create multiple variations, allowing for scenario-based forecasting and comparison.The visual includes robust status management capabilities, allowing users to track and update the lifecycle of plans and versions. 
Fully supported in Power BI Service, PlanIn BI Versioning does not function on Power BI Desktop. This visual requires additional purchases and specific licensing, along with the PlanIn BI - Data Refresh Service (available on AppSource) for real-time data updates. It also relies on a backend write-back web API (advised to be hosted on Azure Web Apps) to enable write-back functionality. Supported databases include Microsoft SQL (on-premises/cloud), Azure SQL, and others. For compatibility with specific databases, please contact us with your requirements. This functionality is Microsoft Fabric compatible.
PlanIn BI Versioning revolutionizes how organizations handle planning and forecasting by offering advanced capabilities for version management, custom base data selection, and scenario comparison—all directly within Power BI. For detailed pricing and licensing information, please contact our support team. Transform your Power BI environment with PlanIn BI Versioning, a comprehensive solution for dynamic planning and forecasting.

Name: Charticulator Visual Community (Editor)
Description: Create custom and reusable charts right within Power BI in the new visual
Long Summary: Create custom and reusable charts right within Power BI in the new visual
Description Full:
Create custom and reusable charts right within Power BI

Charticulator (charticulator.com or https://ilfat-galiev.im/charticulator/) is the no-code way to create custom and reusable chart designs. You can create a custom chart right within Power BI using the Microsoft Charticulator Visual, either from scratch or using a template. With this visual, you can export and import a chart design as a Charticulator template for future reuse. To learn about the core concepts, UI components, and basic interactions of Charticulator, please check out the Getting Started and Video Tutorials pages on the Charticulator website. Also note that many of the charts in the Gallery page have an associated video of their creation process. Charticulator is compatible with the latest version of Microsoft Edge, Google Chrome, and Mozilla Firefox, but not with Edge Legacy and Safari.

This version of the visual has built in editor.
The purpose of the visual is editing or creating templates only to use Charticulator Visual Community (View).

Change log and difference from original Charticulator:

  • Packing inside group
  • Add color filter for image on selection
  • Fix restoring properties for nested chart
  • Catch exception on detect changes that breaks entire editor
  • Reuse hex code from dataset for scales
  • Render axis gridlines even axis is invisible
  • Allow to convert time to local time zon
  • Remove removing tick format for categorical and ordinal data kind
  • Fix ordering expression for axes

Name: Apache ECharts Visual
Description: The EChart Visual combines power of ECharts and Handlebars.js with Power BI data
Long Summary: The EChart Visual combines power of ECharts and Handlebars.js with Power BI data
Description Full:
The EChart Visual combines power of ECharts and Handlebars.js with Power BI data to build about 20 chart types within Power BI like Deneb or Plotly.js visuals.

The visual initializes container and prepares data for the visual. Authors have to specify options for the chart.

The visual creates ECharts dataset from data provided for the visual by Power BI. Or user can use Power of Handlebars.js expressions to bind data directly data properties of ECharts option.

Name: ADWISE Advanced Column
Description: Compare time periods, categories or quantities in advanced column chart with ease. Visual by ADWISE.
Long Summary: Compare time periods, categories or quantities in advanced column chart with ease. Visual by ADWISE.
Description Full:
Advanced Column is easy to use column chart for comparing one or more values with clearly interpretable difference lines. It is best suited for comparison of values between time periods, categories or quantities.
As usual with our visuals, you can apply multiple formatting options to render the visual the way you want, to be easily readeable for users and to correspond with your corporate identity.
You can still use all the standard, but more advanced, features of column chart such as Top N selections, Total column, Axis X, Y break & formatting, gridlines, values + totals, legend and so on with the added ability to compare any columns with "drag & drop" simplicity.

This brand new visual brings to you these features:

  • Chart types - stacked, clustered and nested/chimney charts in one visual with multiple formatting options at your disposal
  • Difference lines – lines to clearly show difference above compared columns with values in specific shapes, all configurable (percentage/absolute difference, colors, borders, rounded corners, lines share starts/ends ...)
  • Top N selection Built in – easily display key data by selecting the Top N columns or Top N segments within each column + the "rest" part of the data
  • Total Column - you don’t need to display separate KPIs to show totals — the Total column is fully integrated in the chart
  • User controls – enable/disable viewer change of Top selections (how many to show, highest/lowest) and Total Column calculation
  • Enable and Add Icons – icons make charts easier to read by visually representing column categories, you can add icons directly in the visual using the built-in icon picker
  • And other formatting - axis Y break, thousand and decimal separator, interaction with other visuals, empty data screen, animations, gradient background, shadows, transparency, ...

See more info (including ChangeLog) on our website: ADWISE Advanced Column

This visual offers in-app purchases and comes with 30 days free trial version. We want you to have full experience of our visual during trial period, so all features are accessible in trial.
You can use basic functionality without watermark. Licensing and pricing plans can be found in our FAQs: ADWISE Advanced Column FAQs

With each trial license you get our demo files with a lot of useful Tips and Tricks to help you start creating stunning charts. You can also check live web demo

And don't forget you to try our other succesful visual ADWISE RoadMap / Gantt

Name: PlanIn BI Table
Description: Visual with write-back capability enables Power BI users to edit, insert, and delete dimension data.
Long Summary: Visual with write-back capability enables Power BI users to edit, insert, and delete dimension data.
Description Full:
PlanIn BI Table is an advanced Power BI custom visual designed to simplify the management of dimension and fact tables directly within the Power BI environment. Seamlessly integrated into planning and forecasting workflows, this visual empowers users to edit, insert, and delete records through an intuitive table interface, bringing full data management capabilities into Power BI reports.

With PlanIn BI Table, users can modify existing records, add new entries, or remove outdated data effortlessly. The visual supports dropdown selections for specific fields during data entry or updates, ensuring data consistency and reducing manual input errors. Its highly interactive design streamlines master data management processes, allowing organizations to maintain accurate and up-to-date dimensions and facts without leaving Power BI.

Fully supported in Power BI Service, this visual does not function on Power BI Desktop. The PlanIn BI Table visual requires an additional Power BI visual, PlanIn BI - Data Refresh Service (available on AppSource), to enable real-time data refresh capabilities. A backend write-back web API (advised to be hosted on Azure Web Apps) is also required to enable write-back functionality. Supported databases include Microsoft SQL (on-premises/cloud), Azure SQL, and more. If you need compatibility with a specific database, please contact us with your requirements.

PlanIn BI Table transforms Power BI into a dynamic, full-featured data management platform, enabling business users to efficiently manage master data and transactional records. Name: Autocomplete Filter (BI-Champ Suite)
Description: A rich text filter that allows search, autocompletion, copy-and-paste list support, and much more.
Long Summary: A rich text filter that allows search, autocompletion, copy-and-paste list support, and much more.
Description Full:
This slicer lets you use autocompletion as part of searching for values in text fields. Autocompletion is a technology that lets the user write some letters within an identifier, word, code, phrase or other text, and the visual predicts one or more possible matches, as choices. If the intended match is shown, it can be easily selected to be included as a report filter.

You can filter using multiple terms (exact or wildcard), use fuzzy matching, copy-and-paste to and from the slicer, see secondary measures in the lookup list, and much more. There are nearly 100 settings that control behavior and formatting. The slicer lets you search efficiently, especially when dealing with identifiers, names, codes, and any text strings of modest length.

There are a wide variety of options, including:
  • Have the visual "complete" what you've started typing based on matches found
  • Allow you to enter one or more search terms - either exact matches or partial matches
  • Options for: case-insensitive, diacritic (accent) insensitive, punctuation insensitive, whitespace insensitive, even a level of spelling insensitive (using fuzzy matching)
  • Multiple fuzzy matching algorithms to choose from (2.0+)
  • Control over where the completion list is placed (2.5+)
  • Intelligently detect the minimum number of characters required before predictions and/or filtering are made
  • In the suggestion list, one can show a "secondary values" that are associated with the search target (e.g. see additional details that might help make a proper selection)
  • Options to "expand" matches: turn partial match text into the matched values in the source data, which can be represented as text (comma or line delimited), which can in turn be copied-and-pasted out of the visual, into other tools such as Excel and email
  • Conversely, take lists of values from tools such as Excel and email and paste them into the filter area
  • When multiples are allowed, you can present your filter list using text or as "pills"
  • Tool-tip and drill through support when viewing exact matches in pill form
  • Optional buttons for reset, toggle inclusion of blank values, copy filtered values, and more
  • Efficient: easily handles a large number of source data rows, with feedback related to status, as data loads
  • Various font and color overrides are possible
  • Control sorting of the pick list
  • It is possible (with some caveats) to overlay the pick list over other visuals on a page (see demo file)
  • Multi-language support (3.1+)
  • Well complemented by our Text From Value visual (see demo file)
The sample pbix file that can be downloaded here and on bizintelligencechampions.com provides a detailed look at how you can use this visual; we highly encourage reviewing it since it can answer many questions (along with the videos on our YouTube channel, @bi-champ).

The visual is free to use in Power BI Desktop for one user. Shared use licensing is available through AppSource (per viewer in Power BI Service), and organizational licensing is available (cost effective for a large number of viewers, no per viewer licensing, works in all environments; see bizintelligencechampions.com for details). Support, feature requests and on-line help are available at bizintelligencechampions.com. Sign up for a free account to get updates and other special perks. We are always interested in hearing about your needs, and you can also contact us directly at info@bizintelligencechampions.com.

NOTE: If you plan to use AppSource licensing, please visit our AppSource Purchase Guide at https://bizintelligencechampions.com/AppSourceGuide.

Release Notes are available at http://bizintelligencechampions.com/notes/autocomp

Name: Write-Back for Power BI
Description: A SaaS Power BI Custom Visual that empowers users to submit data directly from a Power BI report.
Long Summary: A SaaS Power BI Custom Visual that empowers users to submit data directly from a Power BI report.
Description Full:
OVERVIEW:
Write-Back is a SaaS Power BI Custom Visual that enables users to submit data directly from a Power BI report to your database, allowing to implement any actionable use case without leaving the analysis flow. Write-Back for Power BI is a no-code solution. Unlike Power Apps, creating actionable use cases with Write-Back does not require development teams. This means you can implement and manage interactive data entry, editing, and feedback processes directly within Power BI dashboards, streamlining workflows and empowering business users without the need for coding expertise.

To request a trial in a private environment and start using the product tailored to your specific needs, click on "Buy Now", follow the standard subscription process, and take advantage of the 30-day free trial.

If you prefer to explore Write-Back quickly and easily, you can use our Public Demo Environment. Just follow the instructions available here.

For any questions, please contact us at support@writeback4analytics.com

MAIN FEATURES:

User Collaboration
Write-Back turns Tableau into a truly collaborative tool, allowing users to interact seamlessly within dashboards. From real-time data input to notifications, mentions, and approval workflows, it helps teams manage complex business processes without ever leaving Tableau. With intuitive submission methods like Smart Table, collaboration becomes more fluid and efficient, making it easier to act on insights and keep users focused.

Usability
Write-Back enables you to handle the entire process through a user-friendly interface, from setup and data submission to configuring datasets. This makes it accessible for both report creators and report consumers with the appropriate Power BI permissions.

- No-Code solution. Easily implement actionable use cases without the need for development teams, saving time and resources.
- Its intuitive UI allows flexibility according to your use cases, such as submitting data via forms, tables, or data grids, making it seamless and agile for all types of users within Power BI's licensing framework.
- Additionally, it is also possible to upload data from an Excel file directly to a data set, making the bulk insert process much easier. Simply download a template, fill it in and upload your data.
- Add, edit and delete data entries from the UI. All database management actions are handled automatically by Write-Back.
- The original data is never affected because Write-Back uses a different database to store its data.

Governance
Since Write-Back runs on a separate service we need to ensure that security is also applied here. Write-Back for Power BI uses Microsoft Entra OAuth as the authentication method to let your users log in. It also provides an authorization mechanism that lets you define which role users will have when interacting with Write-Back. It is also possible to restrict certain specific actions to specific users. This allows for easier governance over what your users can perform on your Write-Back datasets.

Administration & Embedding
Write-Back has a tool dedicated to the configuration and management of Write-Back.

- You can easily manage some technical settings, including database connections.
- An authorization mechanism is available so you can manage who does what.
- There is also a theming mechanism so you can adjust Write-Back look regarding colors.

Audit Tracking
Any action on Write-Back regarding data or configuration is audited, so you can always keep track of who did what and when.

Check our website product page Write-Back Power BI, to know more.

USE CASES:
Write-Back is the right tool for inputting data on Power BI in an agile way. Being so flexible it can be applied across many use cases, and we are sure you can streamline your company processes!

Find out here, some of the ways how Write-Back can make your life so much easier: Commenting, Forecasting, Managing Reference Data, Mark Annotation, Replacing Values, Root Cause Analysis, Approval…

Name: Comparison Bar Chart For Power BI by ChartExpo
Description: Comparison Bar Chart, A beautiful and advance chart to compare data
Long Summary: Comparison Bar Chart, A beautiful and advance chart to compare data
Description Full:
Introducing the Comparison Bar Chart

A Comparison Bar Chart (CBC) is a fusion of a sorted stacked column chart and a stacked area chart.

But it is way more Powerful.

It goes from left to right. The columns next to each other are linked.

It excels at displaying rank changes, and it always displays the highest value at the top.

What is a Comparison Bar Chart?

Comparison Bar Chart (CBC) simplifies complex data and facilitates quick understanding of contrasts and correlations.

It can be used to showcase the differences and similarities between multiple items, concepts, or entities.

It helps in making informed decisions by highlighting key features, advantages, disadvantages, and other relevant details.

What are the benefits of a Comparison Bar Chart?

Performing competitive analysis with a Comparison Bar Chart (CBC) is essential because:

Visual Clarity:

CBC makes complex data easy to understand at a glance, helping you quickly grasp your competitors' strengths and weaknesses.

Spot Trends:

CBC reveals trends, allowing you to identify what strategies work and what doesn't in your industry.

Comparative Insights:

CBC lets you compare your performance against competitors, showing where you stand in the market.

Informed Decision-Making:

CBC empowers you to make informed decisions by presenting a clear picture of where opportunities and threats lie.

Identify Opportunities:

CBC highlights market gaps and niches, enabling you to identify untapped growth opportunities.

Effective Communication:

CBC simplifies the communication of findings to your team, stakeholders, or investors, ensuring everyone is on the same page.

Competitive Advantage:

CBC allows you to stay ahead of competitors who might not be leveraging this powerful visual.

Track Progress:

Over time, CBC will help you track the impact of your strategies and adjust them as needed for continuous improvement.

Customer Insights:

Comparison Bar Chart can help you understand customer preferences and behaviors, allowing you to effectively tailor your offerings.

Stay Relevant:

In a data-driven world, not utilizing CBC can put you at a disadvantage in staying relevant and competitive in your industry. In summary, Comparison Bar Chart is like having a magnifying glass to see details clearly in a competitive landscape. It's the key to informed decisions, strategic planning, and maintaining a competitive edge.

Help When You Need It

  • Email support: support@chartexpo.com
  • 350+ YouTube videos
  • 1,000+ how-to blogs
  • Sample data and charts to help you get started
  • How-To Video

A multi-axis line chart allows you to display multiple sets of data on a single chart with different y-axes. This type of chart is used when you want to compare data series that have different units of measurement or different scales and need separate axes to effectively represent the data.

Introduction:
Multi-axis line charts are your secret weapon in the world of data visualization. They're not just charts; they're your compass in the data jungle. When you need to uncover hidden trends, correlations, and patterns, these charts are your trusty guides.

Make Informed Decisions:
Because intuition is great, but data-backed decisions are better.

Paint a vivid picture for your audience.

Dive deep, find insights, and make data work for you.

You're no longer guessing; you're deciding. It's like having a crystal ball for your data.

Multi-axis line charts help you dive deep into your data, like a detective unraveling a mystery. Uncover Microsoft Power BI custom visuals for a truly transformative experience.

Name: Inforiver EDITable
Description: Reference data / Master data / Meta data table editor with approval workflow, audit & governance
Long Summary: Reference data / Master data / Meta data table editor with approval workflow, audit & governance
Description Full:
EDITable provides a self-service platform that helps you manage reference data for your reporting & planning applications in Power BI. It complements your Master Data Management (MDM) solution and offers a lightweight alternative for business users that supports both reference data (such as customer, region, and product master) and flat tables (such as price list, contracts, projects, and discounts).

Highlights

  • Edit dimensions & measures in flat tables
  • Designed for business users; requires minimal help and setup from IT
  • Migrate your first Excel table to EDITable in three (3) minutes
  • Supports LIVE sync with data residing in Azure SQL, Databricks, Snowflake, Microsoft Fabric, RedShift, and Postgres

Features

  • Bulk Insert/Edit values
  • Custom approval workflows (table-level, dimension-level, and value-based)
  • Supports Slowly Changing Dimensions (SCD) Type II
  • Change log for enabling audit
  • Conditional formatting
  • Commenting & collaboration
  • Data integration with webhooks
  • Granular user activity permissions (add/delete/edit rows)
  • Columnar permissions (ACL)

Power Your Planning Applications Using EDITable

EDITable ensures that you have full control over master data supporting your planning applications. Be it products, regions, accounts, cost centers, customers, employees, or salaries - you can maintain everything with ease to ensure the integrity of your plans and forecasts.

EDITable makes it much easier to incorporate forward-looking master data that is needed for planning, especially master data that is not yet created in your transaction systems or data warehouses.

EDITable vs. Other Matrix Visuals with Writeback

Discover how EDITable is different from other matrix visuals with writeback capabilities:

  • Data Store: A matrix visual typically consumes data from Table A, and writes back data to Table B. With EDITable, the source & destination tables are (must be) the same as you are working on reference data (which can used by multiple other applications).
  • Connectivity: A matrix visual typically supports both Import and DirectQuery modes. EDITable can only consume DirectQuery (Live) connections.
  • Data Type: A matrix visual typically allows you to update measures; EDITable can be used to update both dimensions & measures.
  • Sample Use Cases: Matrix products are best suited for planning and forecasting applications; EDITable works well for maintaining reference data and flat tables such as price lists, vendor lists, etc.
  • Structure: Matrix products work well with hierarchical data; EDITable exclusively supports flat (non-hierarchical) tables, and offers support for slowly changing dimensions (SCD Type II).

Learn More

  • Visit our website to learn more.
  • Join our upcoming webinars / replay past webinars.
  • Follow us on LinkedIn and YouTube.
  • Post technical questions and interact with other users in the Inforiver community.
  • Schedule a demo with our sales team.

Name: PlanIn BI Comments
Description: Visual with write-back capability enables Power BI users to comment data within the Power BI report.
Long Summary: Visual with write-back capability enables Power BI users to comment data within the Power BI report.
Description Full:
PlanIn BI Discussions is an interactive Power BI custom visual designed to enhance collaboration within planning and forecasting reports. Integrated with the PlanIn BI Matrix, this visual enables users to create, manage, and track discussions directly on specific data points, facilitating real-time collaboration and decision-making. Discussions can be initiated at any level, including individual cells, totals, or aggregated values, ensuring contextualized communication within the Power BI environment.
With PlanIn BI Discussions, users can add messages, assign discussions to specific individuals, tag colleagues, update discussion statuses, and attach images or details for enhanced clarity. When a user is tagged or assigned to a discussion, the system automatically sends an email notification to inform them of their involvement. The visual also captures the report’s filter state at the moment a discussion is created, ensuring that comments appear only when the same filter context is applied.
Users can easily navigate discussions from the main visual interface, filter them based on the creator, assigned user, status, or specific keywords, and quickly locate relevant conversations. The "Filter Page" feature allows users to select a discussion, apply its original filter state to the report, and instantly highlight the corresponding data point within the matrix visual.
Fully supported in Power BI Service, this visual does not function on Power BI Desktop. The PlanIn BI Discussions visual requires an additional Power BI visuals, PlanIn BI Matrix and PlanIn BI - Data Refresh Service (available on AppSource), to enable real-time data refresh capabilities. A backend write-back web API (advised to be hosted on Azure Web Apps) is also required to enable write-back functionality. Supported databases include Microsoft SQL (on-premises/cloud), Azure SQL, and more. If you need compatibility with a specific database, please contact us with your requirements.
PlanIn BI Discussions transforms Power BI into a dynamic collaboration platform, enabling teams to streamline discussions, track decision-making processes, and improve communication across departments. This visual is essential for organizations looking to enhance transparency and accountability in their planning and forecasting workflows.

Name: Task Stream PRO Process Flow Chart
Description: Advanced Power BI custom visual for visualizing multi-level task flows, milestones, and dependencies
Long Summary: Advanced Power BI custom visual for visualizing multi-level task flows, milestones, and dependencies
Description Full:
Task Stream PRO – Process Flow Chart is the professional edition of Softcial’s Task Stream visual, designed for project teams and analysts who need powerful ways to explore and present task structures. This custom visual enables users to map complex processes, track progress, and highlight resource allocation, all directly within Power BI.

With advanced features like multi-level drilldown, effort-based task sizing, and customizable shapes and styles, Task Stream PRO brings project reporting to life with clarity, structure, and style.

Key Features

  • Drilldown Navigation – Navigate through multiple task levels to explore sub-tasks and nested structures while keeping the view clean and focused.
  • Effort-Based Task Sizing – Task containers scale dynamically based on effort values, helping visualize workload and resource distribution instantly.
  • Customizable Statuses – Define your own task statuses. You can customize the color to display the tasks based on their status.
  • Task Shape Customization – Choose between arrows, rectangles, or parallelograms for more flexible and visually distinctive representations, depending on the report’s design or purpose.
  • All features from Free version – Personalize colors, fonts, and sizes for tasks and milestones to match branding or reporting needs.

Business Use Cases

  1. Enterprise Project Management: Visualize project portfolios and drill down into departments or initiatives for better oversight of progress, dependencies, and priorities.
  2. Agile and Software Development: Track sprint tasks and releases using consistent shapes and effort-based sizing to identify high-load areas and improve team planning.
  3. Marketing Campaign Planning: Map out timelines and tasks across campaign stages, using visual customization to coordinate efforts between creative, digital, and strategy teams.
  4. Construction and Infrastructure Projects: Display project phases and dependencies clearly, with effort indicators to highlight resource-intensive activities and support planning.
  5. Product Roadmap Communication: Present product milestones and task flows to align priorities across development, design, and leadership teams.

Note:

To know more about Softcial.

Take a look at our Power BI custom visuals catalog.

For any questions, or requests, contact us at: support@softcial.com

Name: Vcad
Description: Vcad is a powerful custom visual for Power BI that enables seamless integration of 2D/3D BIM models
Long Summary: Vcad is a powerful custom visual for Power BI that enables seamless integration of 2D/3D BIM models
Description Full:
Vcad for Power BI is a cutting-edge custom visual that bridges the gap between data analytics and Building Information Modeling, offering a powerful and seamless way to visualize and interact with 2D and 3D models directly within Power BI dashboards.

Designed for AEC professionals, facility managers, property and asset managers, data analysts, and project stakeholders, Vcad revolutionizes how spatial and non-spatial data are integrated and analyzed. It supports models in widely used formats, including IFC, Revit, Navisworks, InfraWorks, DWG, and more, and allows users to explore them in fully interactive environments embedded directly into Power BI reports. This enables the connection between physical building elements and analytical data, providing a visual understanding that goes far beyond traditional charts and tables.

One of Vcad’s key strengths is its ability to automatically generate Power BI templates, ready for immediate use and customization. This greatly accelerates report creation and allows users to begin analyzing data right away, without having to build dashboards from scratch.

Vcad makes it easy to navigate models, filter, colour and select elements, highlight areas based on custom parameters, and focus on specific floors or components, all while maintaining full synchronization between the model and analytical data. It is available in both the desktop and web versions of Power BI.

Download the sample report and try Vcad right now!

Please note: the Vcad Custom Visual requires a valid license to access full functionality. Some features may be limited or unavailable without an active subscription. For more information about licensing and pricing, please contact us.

Name: Kanban Tasks Viewer PRO Chart
Description: Unlimited tasks, full customization — the ultimate Kanban visual for Power BI professionals.
Long Summary: Unlimited tasks, full customization — the ultimate Kanban visual for Power BI professionals.
Description Full:
Tasks Viewer – Kanban Chart PRO is the advanced version of our popular Power BI custom visual, built for professionals and teams that need complete flexibility and scalability when managing tasks in a kanban-style layout.

Developed by Softcial, this powerful tool allows you to visualize an unlimited number of buckets and tasks, giving you full control over how your workflow data is displayed and interpreted in Power BI. It’s perfect for detailed project management, operational tracking, and process monitoring in dynamic business environments.

With enhanced customization options — including custom bucket order, color schemes (hexadecimal or gradient), and advanced formatting — Softcial Kanban Tasks Viewer Pro helps you turn raw data into meaningful, visual task management boards that adapt to your business needs.

Key Features

  • Unlimited buckets – Visualize as many workflow categories as needed — no limits.
  • Unlimited tasks per bucket – Easily display large volumes of tasks in each bucket, with smooth vertical scrolling.
  • Custom bucket order – Arrange your buckets in any sequence that fits your process or reporting logic.
  • Custom bucket colors – Define colors using exact hexadecimal codes or apply a color gradient for better visual hierarchy.
  • Color logic from data source – Choose between gradient-based styling or use color values directly from your data model for dynamic formatting.
  • All features from Free version – Includes adjustable font size, dynamic task display control, and a user-friendly layout.

Business Use Cases

  1. Enterprise Project Management: Manage complex projects across multiple departments and teams. Visualize tasks across unlimited stages or workstreams with customized bucket layouts and color coding for enhanced clarity.
  2. Large-Scale Service Operations: Track thousands of service tickets, maintenance tasks, or internal requests. Remove limitations on task volume and use dynamic color-coding to identify priorities, statuses, or responsible teams.
  3. Advanced Sales Funnel Management: Monitor diverse lead stages with customizable order and unlimited granularity. Get complete visibility into your sales pipeline with consistent formatting and responsive scrolling.
  4. Marketing Campaign Tracking: Organize campaigns by region, audience, or campaign phase. Apply gradients or specific brand colors to buckets for a polished, professional dashboard presentation.

Note:

Look for other stunning Power BI Visuals at Softcial products catalog.

Learn about the Tasks Viewer PRO with detailed documentation.

Tasks Viewer – Kanban Chart is a custom Power BI visual developed by Softcial, designed to help users visualize and manage tasks using a classic kanban-style layout. With an intuitive interface and flexible display options, this visual is perfect for tracking workflows, project statuses, or any process that benefits from a column-based organization of tasks.

This visual is ideal for business users who need a high-level yet interactive view of task distribution across categories or statuses — known as buckets. Whether managing project timelines, overseeing support tickets, or handling recruitment pipelines, this visual makes it easy to gain insights and take action.

  • Display up to 3 buckets – Categorize your tasks by up to three columns (buckets) for clear segmentation.

Business Use Cases

  1. Project Management: Display tasks segmented by project phases such as To Do, In Progress, and Completed. Offers stakeholders and team leads an immediate understanding of project status and potential bottlenecks.
  2. Customer Support Ticket Tracking: Visualize support tickets grouped by priority or resolution status (e.g., Open, In Review, Resolved). Helps support teams prioritize and balance workloads more effectively by clearly visualizing pending vs. resolved issues.
  3. HR Recruitment Pipeline: Track job candidates across stages like Applied, Interviewed, and Hired. Enables HR professionals to manage candidate flow and follow-up actions in a streamlined, visual manner.
  4. Sales Pipeline Monitoring: Monitor sales opportunities across different stages such as Prospecting, Negotiation, and Closed. Provides sales managers with a snapshot of current deals and where they are in the pipeline.

Name: ArcGIS for Power BI
Description: Custom data visualization to bring mapping capabilities to your reports and dashboards.
Long Summary: Custom data visualization to bring mapping capabilities to your reports and dashboards.
Description Full:
ArcGIS for Power BI lets you build beautiful maps using your data within Microsoft Power BI to unlock the power of location in your business intelligence. Using it is simple – it ships in the box, so just click the icon within Power BI to start mapping. You can also access Esri's global demographic data and basemaps. If your organization does not have location data, you can easily enable your tabular business data and combine it with Esri's global data for greater context. ArcGIS for Power BI also supports connecting to ArcGIS Online and ArcGIS Enterprise, Esri's industry-leading geospatial system. This means that you can easily use your spatial data in Power BI dashboards and reports and distribute it across your organization. ArcGIS for Power BI includes:
  • Basemaps: Access a global collection ready-to-use basemaps with localized languages and geographies.
  • Address Matching: Up to 10,000 points per map with no monthly limits.
  • Content: Combine maps and data from the ArcGIS Living Atlas of the World catalog with your own Power BI business data (public, private, and Esri-sourced).
  • Demographics: Tap into Esri-curated global demographic and lifestyle data for 120+ countries (over 8,000+ variables for the US alone).
  • Spatial Analysis: Understand your data by applying simple spatial analysis tools such as heat maps and drive times.
  • Enterprise System Integration: Integrate your Power BI business data with ArcGIS Online or ArcGIS Enterprise.
    • Learn more about the latest updates in ArcGIS for PowerBI.

Name: Jedox Planning Visual for Power BI
Description: Create dynamic reports and write back to Jedox with Dynatables, integrating planning into Power BI
Long Summary: Create dynamic reports and write back to Jedox with Dynatables, integrating planning into Power BI
Description Full:
Jedox Planning Visual for Power BI

Introducing the Jedox Planning Visual for Power BI, a powerful tool that seamlessly integrates Jedox's advanced planning and analytics capabilities into your Power BI environment. Leveraging Jedox Dynatables, this visual empowers users to create dynamic, on-the-fly reports and writeback to your Jedox Databases & Cubes.

Key Features:

  • Seamless authentication with Single Sign-On, connect to Jedox using your Microsoft account, ensuring scalability and easy deployment for large enterprises while maintaining security standards
  • Create or access your stored Dynatables to enhance your Power BI dashboards. By adding Jedox Dynatables directly into Power BI, users can seamlessly combine multiple data sources in one place, facilitating insight generation
  • Planning capabilities, this visual allows users to input data directly into the Jedox database from within Power BI. The writeback functionality ensures that your data remains updated, streamlining planning and forecasting processes
  • Enhanced Collaboration, by integrating Jedox's planning features into Power BI, organizations can unify their reporting and planning activities, reducing reliance on other tools and promoting a more optimal workflow

Benefits:

  • Streamlined Workflow: Eliminate the need to switch between multiple applications. Analyze, plan, and update your data all within the Power BI interface.
  • Real-Time Data Interaction: Experience immediate visualization of data inputs and changes, enhancing decision-making with up-to-date information.

The Jedox Planning Visual for Power BI is designed to facilitate adoption for organizations already utilizing Power BI, offering a robust alternative to Excel for planning and analysis tasks. Embrace a more integrated and efficient approach to your data management and decision-making processes.

How it works?

There are no local installations or downloads. Simply access the Microsoft Store, search for Jedox Visual, and click on "Get it now". The Visual will be linked to your Microsoft 365 account and accessible to you from work, at home, or while traveling.

Forget about complex on-premises installations. All future enhancements are handled through seamless updates to the latest versions without any additional effort.

Prerequisites to use the Jedox Visual:

To access your Jedox data from our Visual, you must have an active Jedox subscription and a Jedox Cloud Server, this subscription is required to use the core features of the Visual.

You can purchase a Jedox subscription here: https://www.jedox.com/en/platform/pricing/

Please refer to the Jedox Knowledge Base and supporting documentation for comprehensive information about the Jedox Platform Dynatables."

By connecting directly to your CDF instance, this visual allows you to navigate the model, zoom, pan, and select components for detailed inspection. Users can visually correlate their Power BI data with the physical context of their assets by exploring the 3D representation. This enables a richer understanding of spatial relationships within industrial environments and complements other Power BI visuals for comprehensive data analysis.
In order use this visual, and valid subscription to Cognite Data Fusion is required. Contact Cognite at https://www.cognite.com for more details.

Name: Charticulator Visual Community (View)
Description: Create custom and reusable charts right within Power BI in the new visual
Long Summary: Create custom and reusable charts right within Power BI in the new visual
Description Full:
Create custom and reusable charts right within Power BI

Charticulator (https://ilfat-galiev.im/charticulator/) is the no-code way to create custom and reusable chart designs. You can create a custom chart right within Power BI using the Microsoft Charticulator Visual, either from scratch or using a template. With this visual, you can export and import a chart design as a Charticulator template for future reuse. To learn about the core concepts, UI components, and basic interactions of Charticulator, please check out the Getting Started and Video Tutorials pages on the Charticulator website. Also note that many of the charts in the Gallery page have an associated video of their creation process. Charticulator is compatible with the latest version of Microsoft Edge, Google Chrome, and Mozilla Firefox, but not with Edge Legacy and Safari.

This version of the visual doesn't support built in editor.
The purpose of the visual is display ready template built by using original Charticulator visual or new version of Editor visual.

Change log and difference from original Charticulator:

  • Packing inside group
  • Add color filter for image on selection
  • Fix restoring properties for nested chart
  • Catch exception on detect changes that breaks entire editor
  • Reuse hex code from dataset for scales
  • Render axis gridlines even axis is invisible
  • Allow to convert time to local time zon
  • Remove removing tick format for categorical and ordinal data kind
  • Fix ordering expression for axes

Name: JVIZ Product Roadmap
Description: Visualize rolling project data and perform year-over-year (YoY) portfolio management.
Long Summary: Visualize rolling project data and perform year-over-year (YoY) portfolio management.
Description Full:
From dynamic timelines, responsive swimlanes, and bar formatting, JVIZ Product Roadmap is quick to setup and easy to customize. Compare time series data across various project dimensions, epics, and features. Multi-year portfolio reporting has never been easier. 

Whether you are a project manager, event scheduler, SCRUM master, JVIZ Product Roadmap provides a professional view into your portfolio.

Key Features include:

● 𝗖𝘂𝘀𝘁𝗼𝗺 𝗦𝘁𝘆𝗹𝗶𝗻𝗴: Easy color picker and conditional formatting.
● 𝗠𝘂𝗹𝘁𝗶𝗽𝗹𝗲 𝗧𝗶𝗺𝗲𝗹𝗶𝗻𝗲 𝗩𝗶𝗲𝘄𝘀: Year, quarterly and monthly reporting.
● 𝗥𝗲𝘀𝗶𝘇𝗮𝗯𝗹𝗲 𝗦𝘄𝗶𝗺𝗹𝗮𝗻𝗲𝘀: Adjust swimlane categories, size and style.
● 𝗣𝗲𝗿𝗰𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗖𝗼𝗺𝗽𝗹𝗲𝘁𝗲 𝗧𝗿𝗮𝗰𝗸𝗶𝗻𝗴: Quickly view work complete vs. remaining.
● 𝗗𝗮𝘁𝗲 𝗥𝗮𝗻𝗴𝗲 𝗙𝗶𝗹𝘁𝗲𝗿𝗶𝗻𝗴: Multiple ways to slice and dice your schedule.
● 𝗧𝗼𝗱𝗮𝘆 𝗜𝗻𝗱𝗶𝗰𝗮𝘁𝗼𝗿: Toggle the today line setting to stay ahead of schedule.

Name: BIMAppy GeoFilter
Description: With BIMappy Geofilter you can filter PowerBI coordinates based on a GeoJSOn url
Long Summary: With BIMappy Geofilter you can filter PowerBI coordinates based on a GeoJSOn url
Description Full:
BIMappy GeoFilter is a specialized Power BI custom visual that brings powerful yet straightforward geospatial filtering capabilities to your reports and dashboards. Unlike complex GIS tools that require extensive training, BIMappy GeoFilter focuses on doing one thing exceptionally well: filtering coordinate data based on GeoJSON boundaries.
Key-Features
 - GeoJSON-B:ased Filtering: Filter your data points by loading any GeoJSON boundary file
 - Zoom selection: Filter your data points after GeoJSON filter on zoom level

BIMappy is designed for business analysts, location intelligence specialists, and decision-makers who need to analyze geographic patterns without complex GIS tools. It's particularly valuable for retail location analysis, territory management, logistics optimization, real estate assessment, and any business intelligence workflow that includes spatial data components.
Most apps handling geo shapes are either to complex or to limited in functionality. Frustrated with the basic limitations and or complexity of geobased apps I decided to create my own. 
With BIMappy I make map apps easy to use and give 1 functionality that works 100%.

Our custom Power BI visual is designed to help businesses gain deeper insights from their data, with a range of powerful features that make it easy to create dynamic charts and graphs. With our visual, you can transform your data into meaningful insights and make more informed decisions.

Our visual is ideal for a wide range of users, including data analysts, business intelligence professionals, and decision-makers. It is also suitable for businesses across various industries, including finance, healthcare, manufacturing, and more.

Many businesses struggle to gain insights from their data due to the complexity of the tools available. Our custom visual addresses this need by providing an intuitive interface that is easy to use and fully customizable. With our visual, you can quickly create charts and graphs that clearly communicate your data and highlight key performance indicators.

Our visual also helps to address the pain point of data analysis, which can be time-consuming and challenging. With our custom visual, you can quickly and easily create visualizations that provide a deeper understanding of your data, allowing you to make more informed decisions and take action based on insights.

Our visual offers a range of powerful features, including the ability to create dynamic charts and graphs, add custom tooltips and labels, and choose from a variety of chart types and color palettes. With our custom visual, you can tailor your visualizations to your specific data needs, ensuring that you get the insights you need to drive your business forward.

In summary, our custom Power BI visual is the perfect tool for businesses looking to gain deeper insights from their data. Whether you're a data analyst, business intelligence professional, or decision-maker, our visual can help you unlock the true value of your data and make more informed decisions. Try it today and experience the power of our custom visual for yourself.

Name: Time-lines (BI-Champ Suite)
Description: Create a time-line with dots representing events, keyed by dates.
Long Summary: Create a time-line with dots representing events, keyed by dates.
Description Full:
Time-lines let you depict events with relative duration and elapsed time, and can be an effective way to tell a story that involves dates and text. This is extremely well-suited to building compelling infographics.

There are a wide variety of formatting options, including:
  • Can group events by week, month, quarter or year
  • Optionally specify end dates, thereby showing date ranges
  • Control colors through settings or data
  • Categorization of events
  • Interactive filtering
  • Display images alongside events
  • Format settings such as how to delimit grouped events
  • Overlay common time ranges using coloring (1.5)
  • Localization for 27 different languages (1.7)
  • Many other size, shape, and layout settings (50+ settings available!)
The sample pbix file that can be downloaded here and on bizintelligencechampions.com provides a detailed look at how you can use this visual; we highly encourage reviewing it since it can answer many questions.

The visual is free to use in Power BI Desktop for one user. Shared use licensing is available through AppSource (per viewer in Power BI Service), and organizational licensing is available (cost effective for a large number of viewers, no per viewer licensing, works in all environments; see bizintelligencechampions.com for details). Support, feature requests and on-line help are available at bizintelligencechampions.com. Sign up for a free account to get updates and other special perks. Name: User Feedback Capture (BI-Champ Suite)
Description: Allows you to capture sentiment and other feedback from users, directly from within your dashboards.
Long Summary: Allows you to capture sentiment and other feedback from users, directly from within your dashboards.
Description Full:
This visual gives your dashboards the ability to collect user feedback in the form of button clicks, up-down votes, or textual responses (can be numeric, set values, or free-text). These feedback events can be correlated with report data. You can impose constraints on feedback: for example, a maximum of one vote per user, per day... or three votes for a set of choices, per user... and much more. This offers an easy way to determine user sentiment (e.g. about some facets of a report, the report itself, etc.), confirm acceptance (i.e. work-flows), and generally build app-like functionality around your data as held in Power BI models.

You can in turn report against the collected feedback using either data downloading, or a REST API call which provides near real-time results. Use of the API can be done right within Power BI, so you could have a Power BI report that collects feedback, reported on by a different Power BI report! (Among other options.)

Key features:
  • Different modes of feedback entry: simple counter (button), up/down voting, and textual input (with validation)
  • Capture scope can be for a single data point, or for multiple data points coming from the semantic model used by the report
  • Limit the number of feedback events based on "constraints" such as the user, date, or other report data
  • Optionally linking the feedback to specific data in the report makes it possible to build feedback reporting using this data
  • Multiple topics can be used to capture different types of feedback over multiple reports / dashboards
  • Extract feedback data using REST API or CSV/JSON download; with the API, can build Power BI reports that present feedback results using the Web connector
The sample pbix file that can be downloaded here and on bizintelligencechampions.com provides a detailed look at how you can use this visual: we highly encourage reviewing it since it can answer many questions, along with the video available here.

This visual requires a license which can be purchased at https://bizintelligencechampions.com/buy. You can create a free account at bizintelligencechampions, which gives you a trial license key and usage credits to try out this visual. Support, feature requests and on-line help is available at bizintelligencechampions.com. We are always interested in hearing about your needs, and you can contact us directly at info@bizintelligencechampions.com.

Release Notes are available at https://bizintelligencechampions.com/notes/userfb and in-depth instructions can be found at https://bizintelligencechampions.com/learn/userfb

Name: HTML/SVG/Handlebars Visual
Description: The visual uses Handlebars.js to render template and bind data from Power BI
Long Summary: The visual uses Handlebars.js to render template and bind data from Power BI
Description Full:
Handlebars is a simple templating language.

It uses a template and an input object (Data Power BI) to generate HTML or other text formats. Handlebars templates look like regular text with embedded Handlebars expressions.

A handlebars expression is a {{, some contents, followed by a }}. When the template is executed, these expressions are replaced with values from an input object.

Read visual documentation

Long Summary: Present textual content in slide-deck or news article layouts

JVIZ Talking Points is a versatile Power BI visual that allows you to create data-driven narratives that speak to your data stories. Create unique talking points with multi-column layouts to similar to news articles or magazine layouts or configure a traditional single column slide deck layout. Dashboard designs are enhanced when you mix and match multiple JVIZ Talking Point visuals on a single page to create a mosaic of textual content that compliments your charts and graphs. Key Features include: 

● 𝗖𝗼𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗛𝗶𝗲𝗿𝗮𝗿𝗰𝗵𝘆: Add several layers of talking points.

● 𝗗𝗮𝘁𝗮 𝗗𝗿𝗶𝘃𝗲𝗻: Generate dynamic slide decks and visuals. 
● 𝗖𝘂𝘀𝘁𝗼𝗺 𝗦𝘁𝘆𝗹𝗶𝗻𝗴: Easily change the color, spacing, and branding for sections and text.
● 𝗥𝗲𝘀𝗽𝗼𝗻𝘀𝗶𝘃𝗲 𝗗𝗲𝘀𝗶𝗴𝗻: The visual automatically adjusts the text layout.
